name: ZÖMBIE
description:
An example LÖVE game, created for a workshop.

Source available at https://bitbucket.org/gprosser/zombie

Assets used:

  1. https://opengameart.org/content/miscblooddecalparticles
  2. https://opengameart.org/content/clearside-assimilator
  3. https://opengameart.org/content/horror-game-menu
  4. http://freesound.org/people/thestigmata/sounds/202037/
  5. http://freesound.org/people/spookymodem/sounds/249813/
  6. http://freesound.org/people/thefsoundman/sounds/118513/
  7. http://freesound.org/people/LeMudCrab/sounds/163456/
  8. http://freesound.org/people/Ali_6868/sounds/384877/
  9. https://www.dafont.com/gamer-2.font
  10. https://kenney.nl/assets/topdown-shooter
